title.rendered: Young people in the Caribbean take first steps to participate in governance

content.rendered: Secondary school students from the Chaguanas Borough of Trinidad and Tobago have received certificates to mark their participation in the pilot of a project funded by the FundFinity Grants, Fostering a democratic culture in schools and local communities in the Caribbean.

excerpt.rendered: Secondary school students from the Chaguanas Borough of Trinidad and Tobago have received certificates to mark their participation in the pilot of a project funded […]
